text: Adobe Creative Suite (CS) is a design package, a set of professional applications for working with computer graphics, documents and web content produced by Adobe. First presented in 2003. The latest version of the package is CS6 (May 7, 2012). Currently discontinued in favor of Adobe Creative Cloud. The Creative Suite packages were deleted from Adobe's online store in 2013, but were still available on their website until January 2017. == References == Category:Graphics software Category:Adobe software
title: Adobe Creative Suite
